attributes.action: Support future food security by reversing decision on farmers inheritance tax
attributes.additional_details:
I am deeply concerned that the inheritance tax on farms undermines national security. The volatility with current wars, means the UK has to be self sufficient for food.

For the record I am not a farmer, I just can see implications of the decision.
attributes.background: Reverse the decision on inheritance  tax for farmers to allow investment and stability in British food supply chain.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don’t change agricultural & business property relief for inheritance tax
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738236
